fields.label: Purpose
fields.description: Ensures a supportive, non-discriminatory workplace for employees with HIV/AIDS, promoting equality and human rights.

fields.label: HIV Testing Policy
options: No mandatory testing unless legally required

fields.label: Confidentiality
fields.description: HIV status is confidential and only disclosed with employee consent or if legally required.

fields.label: Non-Discrimination
options: No discrimination in hiring, promotion, or benefits
Equal treatment regardless of HIV status

fields.label: Stigma Prevention and Support
fields.description: Encourages open discussion, fosters understanding, and supports an inclusive culture.

fields.label: Education and Awareness
fields.description: Regular HIV/AIDS training to reduce stigma and raise awareness.

fields.label: Policy Review
fields.description: Reviewed periodically to align with legal standards and employee needs.
